text: The customer service here was amazing Kevin was awesome and attentive. The manager was sweet as well but they need more staff Kevin and the manager were the only ones working and they handle it well but that's not fair to only have two people working and doing everything by themselves.

text: This pizza hut is amazing! The manager Courtney is the BEST. We came in late and were hoping to eat in. We were told by the hostess we couldnt but courtney made sure we had EVERYTHING we needed and really took care of us. It was my nieces birthday and she was amazing.
